name: Online PNR Status
short_description:
It is one of the most reliable and trustworthy app which is specialize in helping individuals want to know their current PNR status or other train enquiry in urgent basis. To know your PNR status, install app on your android device, open it and enter your PNR number in the box and hit the "Get PNR Status" button. As soon as, you hit the button it will show your current reservation status on your smartphone screen. In addition to this, it also provide you the resources through which you can check the booking status of all major airlines. 

Key Features of this App:

1. Railway Ticket PNR Status Enquiry 
2. Flight Ticket PNR Status Enquiry 
3. Check Train Coach Position before leaving
4. Simple and Light weight. 
5. User Friendly Interface

We are eager to receive your feedback about this app, you can contact us at our website at http://www.onlinepnrstatus.in/.
summary: Check PNR Status of Indian Railway Reservation or flight booking.
